name: Stronger Together: Cat Dream
description:
Your are a dreaming cat.
Collect sleeping kittens and help them find a new spot to nap!

A - Move left
D - Move right

LEFT MOUSE CLICK - Place a cat
SPACE - Collect placed cats

More levels coming soon! (hopefully)
Unfortunately, we ran out of time and weren't able to add as many as we would like.

We made this game inspired by our beloved cat Maciek. 

Thank you for playing and have a nice day!

Credits:
Jakub Nowak - Programmer
Anna Milczarek - 2D Artist  (https://anks.itch.io/)
Maciek (cat) - Sleeping cat model

Music: Clair de Lune - Debussy

<3
